voltorb_flip_0.1.0.description:
# Changelog

- A location for levels 2-7 each
- Only filler items
- Connects to any HGSS rom (Japan and Korea versions have to be tested though)
voltorb_flip_0.1.0.title: Voltorb Flip 0.1.0

voltorb_flip_1.0.0.description:
# Changelog

Since this version is mostly a rewrite of a good chunk of the code, the following is just a list of all features this version now has:
- Locations for winning each level (1-8)
- Locations for collecting a certain amount of coins (10-50000)
- `Luck` as filler items
- Logic depending on other players receiving certain items (without actually requiring them to progress)
- Options:
  - Goal: `levels`, `coins`
  - Maximum levels (1-8)
  - Maximum coins (10-50000)
  - Coin location steps (10-50000)

# Is this version compatible with older multiworld slots?
No
voltorb_flip_1.0.0.title: Voltorb Flip 1.0.0

voltorb_flip_1.1.0.description:
# Changelog

- Added the `Artificial Logic` option
- Fixed being forced to complete all coin locations in one session
- Added support for simultaneous cooperative playing
- Fixed frequent generation failures by optionally disabling the (now "experimental") logic
- Added host setting to disable the use of experimental logic in generation
- Reworked logic as a whole

# Is this version compatible with older multiworld slots?
Yes, back to 1.0.0
voltorb_flip_1.1.0.title: Voltorb Flip 1.1.0
